Class ReservesRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ipleiria.sas.mobile.cantinaipl.database.CantinaIplRepository

  • public class ReservesRepository
extends pt.ipleiria.sas.mobile.cantinaipl.database.CantinaIplRepository
    Reserves data access class.

    This class allows reserves data management in the application database.

    1.0

    2013.0612

    • Method Detail

      • insertReserve

        public long insertReserve(pt.ipleiria.sas.mobile.cantinaipl.model.Reserve reserve)
                   throws SQLException
        Method to insert a reserve.

        This method allows a reserve record addition on application database. If occur a SQL exception, its is activated.

        Parameters:
        reserve - Object with reserve data.
        Returns:
        The row ID of the newly inserted row;
        -1 If an error occurred.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If a database SQL error occur.
